mapper.select: SELECT PETID,CLASSIFY1, CLASSIFY2,DOGKORTYPE, DOGENGTYPE, GENDER, AGE,PRICE,JUSA, PIC, HEART FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, AA.* FROM (SELECT * FROM PET WHERE CLASSIFY1=1 AND CLASSIFY2='A1' ORDER BY PETID DESC) AA) WHERE RN >= #{startNum} AND RN <= #{endNum}
